Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.expertGame

Class SwapStudentsCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.expertGame.ExpertCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.expertGame.SwapStudentsCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SwapStudentsCard extends ExpertCard implements Serializable
This class represents the card that allows the player to swap a maximum of two students from the entrance to the hall and vice versa.
Author:
Luca Bresciani

  • Constructor Details

    • SwapStudentsCard

      public SwapStudentsCard(SwapStudents board)
      This SwapStudentsCard constructor is used when the player choose to swap two students. It creates a card with the default cost of one.
      Parameters:
      board - is the reference to game used for accessing the current player board

    • effect

      public void effect()
      This effect swap one or two students depending on the choice of the player. It also increments the price of the card the first time this one is used.
      Overrides:
      effect in class ExpertCard
